Lawsuits Touch Off Debate Over Paddling in Schools


By JODI WILGOREN

A small but apparently growing number of parents are suing to stop
corporal punishment in public schools.

http://www.nytimes.com/2001/05/03/national/03PADD.html?ex=989926431&ei=1&en=baa6f8276bff2eb4
